name: Introduction to Algebra
material: Algebra is a branch of mathematics that deals with symbols and the rules for manipulating those symbols. It is a unifying thread of almost all of mathematics.
description: Learn the basics of algebra and solve equations.

name: Physics Fundamentals
material: Physics is the natural science that studies matter, its motion, and behavior through space and time, and the related entities of energy and force.
description: Understand the basic principles of physics.

name: World History
material: World history is the study of major events and civilizations that have shaped human society over time, from ancient times to the modern era.
description: Explore the key events in world history.

name: English Grammar
material: English grammar is the set of structural rules governing the composition of clauses, phrases, and words in the English language.
description: Master the rules of English grammar.

name: Introduction to Painting
material: Painting is the practice of applying paint, pigment, color, or other medium to a solid surface. It is a form of visual art.
description: Learn the basics of painting techniques.
